name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, Lao Dongyan posted on WeChat Moments: "Some departments are really despicable. I have returned to China, you can come to me directly, don't spread rumors online, and don't sell them on your own system." At the same time, searching for "Lao Dongyan" on Weibo currently only shows content before July 31.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Qingdao, Shandong. A college student was stopped by an old man with a red armband while selling small toys on the roadside. “Do I need to explain to you? Who do you think you are?” The videographer: Someone asked me to delete the video because they were afraid it would affect the city’s image.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of August 16, the first trial of the case in which a 9-year-old girl in Changsha was hit on the head by a teacher with a triangle board was held. The teacher involved, Song Yuming, was prosecuted for intentional injury. On the same day, the child's mother posted a video saying that she would do her best to fight for justice for her daughter! The daughter also said, "I hope the police uncle can arrest him and stop hurting other students."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Doctors remove foreign body from girl's skull

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Liuzhou, Guangxi. A 13-year-old boy on Beique Road was reported online to be tied to the neck with an iron chain by a man who claimed to be his father and dragged on the road. In the video, the man rode an electric bike and tied the child's neck with an iron chain. The boy ran barefoot and almost fell. Passersby stopped him and called the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The girl's mother recounted the cause of the incident in an interview earlier.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, it was reported online that Zheng Zhiying, chairman of Handan Bank, was murdered that day by a fired bank employee (branch president). Police report: The suspect was detained on the spot by the public security organ, and the case is under further investigation.
